channel.description: Recent content in ntc on It's Always the Network

item.title: NFD27 - Network to Code
item.description: Preamble time! Nautobot vs. NetBox has been a sensitive subject in the community. I’m not here to sway you or endorse one over the other. Use what you think fits you and your organization best. After ZPE, Network to Code was up to talk to us about all of the latest with Nautobot. The presentations were cohesive, and they told a compelling story: you’ve got stuff to do, and we help you do those things.
